title: Cardi B flaunts derriere in barely-there thong swimsuit as she and Offset enjoy Caribbean getaway
text:
They are hip-hop royalty who have been living like kings and queens during their trip to the Caribbean island of Turks And Caicos this week.

And much like previous days, the Clout rappers flaunted their fun in the sun on the scenic sandy shores while enjoying another turn on a jet-ski.

Never one to be take a backseat when it comes to commanding attention, Cardi took center stage in the photo with her famous derriere in nearly full view, dressed in a zebra-print thong swimsuit.

'Ain't no complaint,' she gushed in the caption.

Scroll down to video

Fun in the sun: Cardi B and husband Offset flaunted their trip to the Caribbean island of Turks And Caicos with another snap of them enjoying another turn on a jet-ski

The barely-there number also helped the Bodak Yellow star to showcase her massive body art along her thigh, booty and back as she sat in the driver's seat of the jetski.

Her long dark tresses, that normally cascade down her back, were pulled over her right shoulder and she added a matching zebra-print headband.

Offset stood to her left, with his ripped abs on full display, dressed only in black shorts.

Keeping with his penchant for bling, the Migos star wore a massive, eye-glaring chain.

On display: Cardi has been also flaunting her womanly curves in a zebra-print thong swimsuit

The couple have shared at least two other social media snaps of themselves on jet-skis, including one that was posted on Tuesday that showed Cardi mounting her legs on Offset's shoulders.

Cardi appears to be wearing that very same zebra-print swimsuit that's held together with intricate straps across her rib cage and neck.

There's another photo that shows Cardi hanging onto her man as they cruise past and old ship relic in the ocean.

The Birthday bash continues: The couple began the trip by continuing their celebration of Cardi's 27th birthday, which was officially on October 11

Romantic: The couple began the trip by continuing their celebration of Cardi's 27th birthday, which was officially on October 11

The couple began the trip by continuing their celebration of Cardi's 27th birthday, which was officially on October 11.

Some family and friends also took the trip with them.

In another earlier post, Cardi put on a busty display in an orange gown that featured a sexy plunging neckline.

The piece also helped her show off her curvy legs with a thigh-high leg slit and a four-foot train.
description: Cardi B flaunted her famous derriere in barely-there thong swimsuit as she and husband Offset enjoy the spoils of Caribbean getaway.on Wednesday.
